By GoldenBoy on Saturday, November 3, 2007 - 09:23 pm:

So a quick update about how I spend a lot of my time. I play City of Heroes, and lately have been doing work as Editor in Chief of a weekly newzine called the City Scoop. It's a great little project. I just got the word tonight that someone even liked us enough to profile us:
http://www.massively.com/2007/11/03/extra-extra-read-all-about-it/

I post as Lemur Lad. Most of my articles may not make sense unless you're a player of the game, but it's been a rewarding experience.
